content: well said — i have known lonelinesss — and i attracted many other desperates like me with whom relationships were based on dependency- they could and did not last— but i learned how to fill my own life with richness on my own — and then once i was less needy i found my life was getting too filled up with people wanting more from me than I could give so I cut back to those with whom I could give quality of contact and friendship, and then i found true deep companionship and meaningful relationships. I have never lost my compassion for the lonely out there but we also need to take responsibility for our own lives first and then we are only a joy to others and they to us .
